Burned.DESCRIPTION: [A-R] #yElemental #yDebuff. When you attack a creature with [Burned], gain temporary [Vigor].

Chilled.DESCRIPTION: [A-B] #yElemental #yDebuff. When a creature with [Chilled] takes #yAttack damage, it gains [Frostbite].

Combust.DESCRIPTION: #yCombust an #yElemental #yDebuff by playing an #yAffinity card against a target with it. | [A-R] -> [Chilled], [A-G] -> [Stoned], [A-B] -> [Burned], [A-O] -> [Flowed].

Corrosion.DESCRIPTION: [A-D] #yElemental #yDebuff. When #yAttacking, deal a portion of damage dealt to yourself and ALL allies.

Electrified.DESCRIPTION: [A-L] #yElemental #yDebuff. Cards played on this target grant additional #yReaction.

Elemental Debuff.DESCRIPTION: [Burned], [Flowed], [Chilled], [Stoned]. Remove at the end of the round.

Elemental Mastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would gain #yAura stacks or apply #yElemental #yDebuffs, increase their stacks.

Flowed.DESCRIPTION: [A-G] #yElemental #yDebuff. When attacked, deal a portion of damage received to ALL allies.

Frostbite.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, lose HP and cut stacks in half.

Fusion.DESCRIPTION: Combine #yOrbs to create a new #yOrb dependent on the #yOrbs chosen.

Morph.DESCRIPTION: Change both directions of a #yCombust reaction into a #yRedox or vice versa.

Reaction.DESCRIPTION: Obtained from #yCombusting and #yRedoxing. Can be spent to level #yElemental #yDebuffs.

Redox.DESCRIPTION: #yRedox an #yElemental #yDebuff by playing an #yAffinity card against a target with it. | [A-R] -> [Stoned], [A-G] -> [Chilled], [A-B] -> [Flowed], [A-O] -> [Burned].

Stoned.DESCRIPTION: [A-O] #yElemental #yDebuff. When you target a creature with [Stoned], gain [Block] next turn.
